page.title: 07BASILDON NE: LOCAL SURVEY
page.content: Children from a local school asked their parents what they liked best about Basildon. The ten most common answers were: 1. Plenty of trees and open spaces. The council has worked to maintain and plant as many trees as possible all over the area, and to keep open spaces for recreation. 2. Plenty of shops. There are many small shops over the area which though expensive, provide a welcome service. 3. Good to pensioners. 4. Good housing. 5. Plenty of facilities. 6. Entertainment. 7. Cleanliness. 8. Good parking. 9. Being near the countryside & sea. 10. A street market in the town.
